name: MMOBomb
tag_list: mmorpg-mmo, games, free-mmorpg, free-mmo, online-games, free-to-play
description: Free to play online games portal
overview:
MMOBomb.com is a fast growing independent platform for free-to-play online games, developed by members with several years of experience in video-games journalism and by players from all over the world, closely following the exciting rise of the free-to-play games market.

MMOBomb.com aims to become the ultimate source for free-to-play games while at the same time offering advanced tools so that both Publishers and Developers may share and feature their views, consequently turning MMOBomb.com into the mandatory destination for productive, intelligent, and significant discussions concerning free-to-play online games.

milestones.description: Site collapses under traffic from Aion subscribers attempting to get a Llama Pet.
